data.text: @TJuva @erinmdurkin @NYCMayor Hey scumbag, some of us - 3 million of us to be exact - have been injured by this “vaccine” so shut your mouth! If you’re afraid of COVID, CORRECT YOUR DIET!
@erinmdurkin @NYCMayor Schools, OK. Restaurants and other places? Nah. Now the great unwashed will run around town with their nose in the air. Dumb idea.

@erinmdurkin @NYCMayor If you want to bring new yorkers back to restaurants, ask around - if you've stayed out so far, and been considering going back in, would you still go in  not knowing who's vaxxed and who's not?
@erinmdurkin @NYCMayor So the vaccine refusers are getting rewarded. 🧐
